welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mariano Comense, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device, can be extended for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all incoming and outgoing flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal, mainly used by low-cost airlines for European flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
